verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Atma niyamamu dwara sagi povudamu Viswasamunaku karthayu danini Konasaginchedi yesuni joochuchu Opikatho manamu sagi povudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhakthi heenulaku neethini jatuchu jala pralayamuna Odalo jerina novahuvale manamu saagi povudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Siddaparachina puramunu jera vagdhanamulanu Nammi nadichina abrahamu vale saagi povudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghoramainaya jaratwamunaku dooramuganu Paripoina yosepunu boli saagipovudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni prajalatho sramaye melani igupthu papapu Bhogamu vidichina moshevale manamu saagipovudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parisuddhatmatho nindina vadai dhairyamuga vakyamunu Bodhinchina pethuru vale manamu saagipovudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Poru sahinchi suvaartha pakshamuna parugu muginchi Panarpanamaina Bhaktha powlu vale saagipovudamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thetaga daiva sankalpamu delpuchu raallanu ruvvaga Pranamu vidichina Stepnheuvale manamu saagipovudamu{/lang-eng}
